insertStyleRules: button { transition: all 0.3s ease !important; position: relative !important; overflow: visible !important; }

button:focus, button:active { background-color: #10b981 !important; color: white !important; transform: scale(0.95) !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0 5px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.9) !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0 5px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.9), 0 0 0 10px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.7), 0 0 0 15px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.5), 0 0 0 20px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3) !important; outline: none !important; }

button::after { content: "" !important; position: absolute !important; top: 50% !important; left: 50% !important; width: 0 !important; height: 0 !important; border-radius: 50% !important; background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.5) !important; transition: width 0.4s, height 0.4s !important; transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important; z-index: -1 !important; }
